role_definition: Handle the deployment, execution and on-going refinement of a customer campaign. This includes many types of proactive customer campaigns such as up-sell, cross-sell and customer retention. The campaign execution process performs the initial selection and confirmation of candidate customers and includes providing critical feedback on the impact of the campaign to the design unit to support re-calibration and refinement of the specification based on practical experience
core_business_object: Not explicitly specified in the document
example_of_use: A bank implements a targeted cross-sell campaign in the customer servicing center to generate additional sales
executive_summary: Execute a customer campaign (version) and track and respond to impact
